website_summaries.verdict: With texture and flavor unlike any other, these are "world's best" for a reason.
pros: The bag comes with 12 flavors, each distinct
Made with fresh fruit flavors, which shows in the fresh taste of the bears
Some buyers say these bears taste like they were just manufactured
cons: No resealable closure for the 5 lb

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They're soft and chewy with really good ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're soft and chewy with really good flavor! My coworkers and I think we've figured out which flavor is which.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: "WARNING" !!
customer_reviews.text: These bears are as addicting as heroin or tobacco , but far better for you-That is , IF you can control your intake............Ate 3 lbs. in the first 4 days , I am now in gummy rehab & can only have 20 bears per day . Be careful as it is far to easy to become a "gummy junkie"
customer_reviews.author: Starlight Express

customer_reviews.title: 5 lbs....
customer_reviews.text: 5lbs of gummy bears !!! 5lbs of gummy bears !!! 5lbs of gummy bears!!! Great until youth group found out I had them. Now my wife is making me share. :( Great flavor and texture. Will be buying again this time not telling my wife. PS don't tell her.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like chemicals, disappointing and inedible.
customer_reviews.text: Literally just taste like chemicals. Sure, there are shades of something that might be fruit (but isn't quite), but the main taste is straight up sickeningly chemical. I have no clue why the reviews of these are so high, I'm EXTREMELY disappointed and think they're seriously disgusting. When I tried to give them a chance and ate a few of them at once, hoping I just needed to learn to like them, I ended up with a chemical burn in my mouth and drinking tart things burned my tongue. No lie. Seriously. Don't trust all the stars. These are massively gross, inedible, I'm throwing 4 3/4 pounds away. Go buy some Haribo.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Wy

customer_reviews.title: Blood?? what is it?
customer_reviews.text: So i have bought these yummy things in the past, i happened to pay attention to what i was nomming on and saw this gummy... this honestly looks like half coagulated blood drop stuck inside of the gummy.. utterly disgusted... needless to say upon closer investigation, I am still positive it is not any sort of candy substance... not this is not a joke.. I am pretty disappointed because i love these things.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Excited
customer_reviews.text: I looked these up after seeing them on a YouTube video. I have been looking for a good gummy, one that had different flavors, not just different colors and these Albanese check all the boxes for me. They are wonderfully soft and I can actually tell the difference in flavors. I eat one and then I find I have eaten 6! I didn't realize how much 5 lbs was so everyone stopping by will be taking a small bag home with them. Win-Win. Fortunately, mine came in perfect shape in both package and product. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Inedible
customer_reviews.text: I loooove gummy bears. I go through a 3lb bag of golden bears a week. When I saw these advertised, I jumped to order them. But I wasn’t impressed. You know how something rubbery (e.g. yoga mat, exercise ball) has a pungent like toxic fumes odor when you first open it? These gummy bears were WORSE. I opened the bag, and my partner smelled it from across the house. They didn’t taste any better (haha - my own fault for thinking the taste would be better than the smell). Threw away the whole bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jack H

customer_reviews.title: Good squish & fresh smell but torn open bag
customer_reviews.text: Update: this company didn’t hesitate to resend a new bag and I was right that they taste as good as they smell! Fresh, full of flavor, great quality and great product. 😊 Original message: I’ve never tried this company before. Everything looks good and smells good but it came ripped open so I’m hesitant to eat it and asked for a replacement. Other than the rip and reluctant to taste I would give a 5 star because smell and fresh squish feel is perfect
customer_reviews.author: ammie clark-nelms

customer_reviews.title: Go back in the cave
customer_reviews.text: These bears need to go back into their caves... their creators need to stir the pot and work some magic. I’ve been eating gummi bears for over 50 years, so I know something about gummies. I grew up with Haribo, but every 5-10 years I venture out of the Haribo forest and try another species. Sorry, these Albanese have a strong hint of cherry cough medicine... yuck. I also tried the Black Forest gummies... they just lack the tang, slight honey flavor and chewiness of Haribo... just bland.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Gummy Goodness
customer_reviews.text: I love these gummies. The consistency is, well, gummy and the flavors a little different than traditional gummy things. Just opening the bag is a blast of fruity scented sensation. It's hard to pick a favorite flavor out of 12! Dome of mine melted together in the bag...my favorite colors. Ususlly, it would be a complaint, but it is so beautiful! What would make this particular 5 lb bag perfect would be a zip closure. But hey, you can't have it all!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Pavlica

customer_reviews.title: Delish
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered these right after surgery so I don't remember doing it but I'm sure glad I did. When I was doing at home physical therapy and saw the poor mail woman drag this down the walk I was shocked. Upon discovering it was so many gummi's I was still shocked. I was pleasantly surprised how good they taste tho and they are still fresh 2 months later into my healing so good on them. I recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Kelby Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Terrific; Gives Haribo A Run For It's Money!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely killer. I was concerned at first; upon first opening the package, it smelled a little strange, but I think it was just overwhelming. Hesitantly, I grabbed a couple, and oh my. These. Are. Fantastic. They are VERY soft and gummy, unlike other brands which are harder and can hurt your jaw after a handful. Twelve flavors, and each one is great (besides grape, but that's just personal taste). The peach ones are the best! I'd say this is an awesome value. I personally am not sure if I prefer the firmer Haribo gummies or these, but it's very close. I'd definitely try!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for children & adults alike
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this item once before. I was happy with my first purchase, but not so thrilled with the second purchase. When I got the five-pound bag the second time, I think it may have been a packing error. I could smell the gummy bears before I opened the package. The Amazon box was filled with other items too, and they were all fine. The package looked like it split along the seam, and made me concerned for anyone to eat the gummy bears -- I would purchase them again, but I'd probably want to have it shipped separately or in better packaging.
customer_reviews.author: ItalianHomeChef

customer_reviews.title: Where did they go?
customer_reviews.text: I had this bag of Gummi Bears for 4 days and someone stole them. The bag is empty all 12 flavors are missing, it must have been my 4 cats they aren't talking. No one else knew they were in the house, I had opened the bag and ate a few in the evenings, maybe morning, possible in between. Who could eat a 5 pound bag in 4 days, they are good really good better than others the flavors stand out you can taste each. I ended up trying different flavors together then apart, mixed then gone. The only solution is to buy another bag and watch my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Raven4464

customer_reviews.title: 12 Flavors!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried at least Six different brands of Gummy Bears and I like the Albanese World's Best 12 Flavor Gummi Bears the Best. In the past, other brands, were too chewy and I ended up with a headache afterwards, but not with the Albanese, they are really soft and have a good consistency. The Flavors that are included: Cherry, Pink Grapefruit, Watermelon, Strawberry, Orange, Blue Raspberry, Lime, Grape, Green Apple, Mango, Pineapple, and Lemon. Overall, well worth it, the Albanese has 12 Flavors, enough said..
customer_reviews.author: jean doe

customer_reviews.title: Some bags better than others
customer_reviews.text: I'm a picky person. I only like some of the flavors. My favorites are the purple and orange ones. Sadly, those are often not very prevalent in a bag. Sometimes there are not many strawberry/lime ones. In a perfect world, there'd be equal amounts of flavors. But that's just not the case. I've still ordered 15lbs of gummy bears so don't think I'm not out here still enjoying them. I just end up giving my bf the other flavors. The bag often starts falling apart in a couple days. I always transfer to big ziploc baggy and I prefer that bc it's easy to see the bears.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve had!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised by these, they are probably best gummy bears I’ve ever had. They’re super fresh, flavorful and soft . The flavors taste very natural and fresh and not too sweet or overpowering but also just right, normally gummy bears for me don’t have much of a taste and are too chewy but not these! Love them and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail
customer_reviews.text: Yet another item to add to my subscriptions... I'll just start signing over my paycheck to you now, Amazon. First of all, how have I lived nearly 4 decades without experiencing this gummy perfection? I don't know how, but I do know that these are the holy grail for gummy candy fanatics. Perfectly soft and very flavorful. Very fresh tasting and the flavors actually taste real rather than artificial like most gummy bears. I'm ruined for all other brands now. Enjoy my money, Amazon. If you need me I'll be living under a bridge, living off of a 5 lb bag of gummy bears.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rae

customer_reviews.title: Absolute NO (Overpowering Chemicals)
customer_reviews.text: Given the glowing reviews, we bought these as a gift for a gummi bear lover. Thank goodness we opened the package first! The chemical smell was overpowering—truly astonishing, as if they'd been bleached. There's no way we'd let anybody eat these. Immediately requested a return/refund and cannot recommend. The only thing we can say for sure is that they're very squishy (fresh).
customer_reviews.author: KeeKee

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! Some of the best gummies, but overpriced on Amazon (as are many things)
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best gummies out there! Insanely flavorful, with every one of the 12 flavors being incredibly distinct. It makes you really want to eat one at a time and truly enjoy the differences between them. I'm knocking a star ONLY because Amazon is charging way too much. You can see this reflected in the 32oz sour version, which is $14.xx compared to Walmart's $6.48 which is CRAZY, especially when you consider it now qualifies for one day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Divine Seven

customer_reviews.title: Truly The Worlds Best Gummy Bears!
customer_reviews.text: They really are the worlds best gummy bears! This is my third 5lb bag! I have to keep some of these around. I’m really glad that they haven’t come melted together. I was definitely afraid of that. When I get them I move them around and then the bag in the fridge for a couple hours. This I learned helped with the sticky feeling when you first open it. But they are definitely addicting! I just wish with a large bag like this there was a resealable option. I just put it inside a gallon size ziploc bag.
customer_reviews.author: Faithnlove

customer_reviews.title: The best gummy bears.
customer_reviews.text: A while back there was this discussion on Reddit about the best gummy bears and these kept coming up as unarguably the best. I was like, haha, that's ridiculous, gummy bears are gummy bears, how can one brand be *better* than another? They're all kinda the same. But my two-year-old daughter likes gummy bears, and these were cheap, so, whatever, let's try 'em out. I would like to acknowledge my mistake. These are *great* gummy bears. They taste like fruit, not artificial flavor, they're soft and delicious and fantastic. They'd be a good purchase at twice the price. If you want gummy bears, you should be buying these.
customer_reviews.author: ZorbaTHut

customer_reviews.title: Bag was split wide open!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product bag was shipped with the bag split wide open! In these days of COVID-19, can this be trusted??? One star because this was the least I could rate. Deserves a “zero” rating!
customer_reviews.author: terry38086

customer_reviews.title: Best Gummy Bears I’ve eaten!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a gummy bear addict and keep a stash in my house at all times. I was at a store shopping and saw the Albanese brand for the first time and was pondering whether or not to try them or stick with my regular brand. There was a lady standing beside me and we began to chit chat about how we both love gummy bears. She encouraged me to give them a try, telling me that they were the best she’d ever tasted. We even exchanged telephone numbers so I could give my opinion on them. I’m a believer now and absolutely love this brand and immediately ordered a 5 lb bag to share with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: newfiegirl02

customer_reviews.title: World's Best - Absolutely
customer_reviews.text: Having had a sweet tooth for decades, and coming from a family in the candy industry, I've been eating gummi bears for as long as I can remember. Taste/flavor can be subjective for certain - however - I can say that every single flavor in this pack is consistently delicious, and, every single person I have "turned on" to this product have said they are the best they have ever eaten. I'll never purchase another bag of another brand so long as these are available. So, take that for what it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Breslin

customer_reviews.title: Embarrassed how fast we ate these.
customer_reviews.text: This was a late night, not entirely sober purchase that ended up being fantastic. These were so tasty! Only reason I give 4 stars instead of 5 was that some of the flavors (mostly just cherry) had a sort of strong chemical-y taste to them that threw me off. Not sure if that was normal. The rest of them were really delicious though! The light blue strawberry were my favorite. I thought these would last a long time but between me and my husband they were gone in just a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: ToWhenTFor

customer_reviews.title: It’s true ! They actually are “The worlds best gummy bears”
customer_reviews.text: My family absolutely loves these! I have purchased so many lbs of these it’s ridiculous but what can I say, they are the best ! I received two 5 lb bags and sadly one of them was not sealed in the back well enough, I contacted seller and my issue was immediately addressed to my satisfaction. I love being able to purchase this large bad again. My local grocer no longer has it so this was a thrill to find. You have to try these. When they say they are the “Worlds Best” they aren’t lying !!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Funky Aftertaste. Back to Black Forest brand!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Albanese Gummy Bears after reading the 5-Star reviews. We also liked that fact they were made in the USA. The texture and coloring is excellent. However, none of that overcomes the musty (or musky?) aftertaste. Some of the 12 flavors are pretty good but many leave a bad taste in your mouth. Perhaps if Albanese concentrated their efforts on fewer flavors they would be of better quality. We recommend the Black Forest brand.
customer_reviews.author: Physics Teacher

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: My batch tasted stale or was lacking a fruity punch. All the flavors kind of blended and tasted muddy which indicates to me that they sat for a long period of time in the bag before shipment. They smelled overly perfumed and not in a good way. They also tasted somewhat saccharin in their level of sweetness. The texture was not as firm as other brands which some may prefer (but I didn't). My package was a bit beaten up like it had been sitting for a long period. If you are craving gummy bears, my suggestion would be black forest. A bit firmer texture and much more of a juicy fruity tang.
customer_reviews.author: Nesmuelm

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, hands down the best gummies I've ever had (and I've been eating gummies from all over the world for over 20 years!) These are very fresh and easy to chew, straddling the line between the firmness of a haribo gummy and the softness of say, a fruit snack. The variety of flavors is great , and they all taste good. The only possible downside is that the bag is not resealable, but most 5lb bags of gummies are not, so I always plan on sealing the opened package in a gallon zip top bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Donovan III

customer_reviews.title: I did like the black forest ones pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a gummy bear fan. Brand didn't always matter. I did like the black forest ones pretty well. Wife and kids are fans as well. Then I found these oddly packaged ones. Hmmnnn....lots of flavors...interesting. Ok, first grape fruit sucks. its the only one no one in the family eats. I can't keep the rest around. They are phenomenal. perfect texture, the flavor is much stronger than the other ones. Oh man. My daughter and my son picked out all the purple grape and blue ones first. Dagnabbit. If you're a gummy bear fan...just try one bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B

customer_reviews.title: Beats. Bears. Best gummy bears in existence.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gummy bears. I never knew gummy bears could be better than other gummy bears. I ordered this the first time simply because I wanted a bulk amount. Then we were shocked at how much better these were than usual gummy bears. We use them for special treats and rewards for our potty training toddler (and we snack on them ourselves hehe). We keep the bag inside a ziploc gallon bag and they stay fresh until all have been eaten (1-2 months!). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meesh

customer_reviews.title: Love the gummy bears
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a lot of gummy bears and the flavours are really great. As opposed to Haribo, Albanese has way more flavours, my fav is the purple one. Downside which isn't even a downside is it's a large bag, and being as addictive as it is I end up eating too much too quickly!
customer_reviews.author: K00

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition perfect movie snack
customer_reviews.text: This package was in the same box as the items in my review of the Albanese 6 pk variety (you can find that review) these are in absolutely perfect condition each little gummy well formed and it’s own individual piece. They are extremely fresh. You get to taste each of the 12 flavors. There is no way to reseal this package so have a gallon ziplock on hand or a box of snack size ziplocks to portion into. These are my new addiction. While definitely a gummy the are soft not hard and extremely chewy like most other gummy brands.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lovec

customer_reviews.title: rev0118NO417A Flavor and Texture Best By 8127 2151
customer_reviews.text: I have had many 5 lb bags of Albanese gummy bears and these are not right. You can't taste the individual flavors and they all taste lemony. And they're hard compared to the consistency they usually have! Please investigate this. So disappointing! rev0118NO417A Flavor and Texture Best By 8127 2151 NOV/07/19
customer_reviews.author: anne yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Best gummies. Bag should be resealable.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gummies! I do wish that the bag was resealable, which is why I’ve taken a star off of this rating. In order for the gummies to stay fresh for a long time, I keep them in a ziplock bag, but it would be very nice and save a bag if I didn’t have to use one. Back to the gummies: THEY ARE AMAZING. Buy this now.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived melted
customer_reviews.text: Cant really tell anyone how these taste. They were shipped, in the heat of summer, with nothing to protect them. They arrived basically melted into one giant puddle. Refrigerated them hoping to salvage some part if this. Now I have one giant gummy mass. I dont know who to contact about this issue, but buyer beware. Edit: I decided to attempt to do a return. Amazon is currently sending me a replacement bag . I.hope they have figured out a different way to ship
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE TRULY THE BEST GUMMY BEARS IN THE WORLD!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy Haribo gummy bears! They are terrible compared to Albanese gummy bears! Haribos are hard and tasteless compared to these! These are packed with flavor, soft, easily chewed and fresh! I'd recommend these to ANYONE who wants the very best for themselves or family and friends who enjoy this kind of candy!!! I've bought 3 five-pound bags of these and devoured them already and have another bag on order!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carl W. Alvers

customer_reviews.title: Buy these! Best flavors and texture!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Albanese pink grapefruit bag for my toddler’s first birthday party that was rose gold/pink theme. They were so so delicious, soft and chewy with the best taste and texture. Everyone who tasted them raved about them. So of course, I had to try all the other flavors. This five pound bag is solid!! Love all the other flavors and I was able to fill my candy jars and share with neighbors with this goodie haul.
customer_reviews.author: Vicsosic

customer_reviews.title: Albanese gummy bears 12 flavors
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve tried this brand. These don’t taste good. Very plastic taste. The individual flavors by themselves are just ok but when you grab a small hand full and put the various flavors together it just tastes like plastic. These tasted so bad I’m actually throwing them out. I can’t figure out how they got the flavors in these gummies but it’s very artificial. Most gummies have that juicy sweet taste or corn syrup type sweet taste and you can only eat so many before it’s a little to overly sweet. This brand however I only could eat a very small number before it just started to leave a plastic taste and a very bad taste.
customer_reviews.author: W. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The best flavor of any Gummi Bears,
customer_reviews.text: My grandson turned me on to these Gummy Bears,. I treated myself to a bag of these as a treat for having shoulder surgery. I knew I would be down (physically) for awhile after surgery and these help[ed to put a smile back on my face. The flavor is perfect and they all can be mixed together when eaten. No flavors collide with each other. Amazing. 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Navy Boy

customer_reviews.title: The winner in the Gummy Bear race
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best gummy bear you’ll ever eat more flavor and softer than most gummy bears.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good but with some drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Softly chewy. The flavors are nice enough, but really not as tasty as the "TruEarth" gummies I usually buy. TruEarth was unavailable. The texture of TruEarth just a little firmer, and I prefer it. The heavy bag of the Albanese gummies is inconvenient to handle. I had to divide it into serving sizes in sandwich bags... work intensive and wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Life changing Gummies
customer_reviews.text: As a child I was always lacking in the gummies department. Now as an adult my house never goes without!! Albanese is simply one of the best, if not THE best gummies out there! Soft, colorful, and full of flavor what more could one ask for out of a gummy?! Not much I say! Give um a go! I've got many people hooked and will continue to bring more to my dark side!!
customer_reviews.author: Jollyholiday7

customer_reviews.title: Fresh, soft and amazing flavor
customer_reviews.text: Found this brand of gummies for the first time in California while on vacation and they blew my mind-- I'm from NY so I'm used to rock hard Haribo from the Bodega and this bag of Albanese was just as fresh, soft and flavorful as the first bag I ever bought in Cali. Now Haribo is just a distant memory and I keep a 5lb bag of these bad boys by the bed for me and my fiance to tear up whenever we watch TV in bed. Multiple forSO good!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Pinkhasov

customer_reviews.title: 1K reviews can't be wrong!
customer_reviews.text: These gummi bears are the absolute best! I've been around the block with gummi candies (my husband is a sugar addict) and Albanese are hands down my favorite. They are soft and chewy, with a delicious flavor. Bonus, there are so many different flavors! Whenever anyone asks for a gummi recommendation, I go with these. Plus, the 5 lb bag is HUGE and this price is a steal. Think about how much a tiny bag costs at the store (what, like $4-5?). With these, you get something like 77 servings for $12. Yes, please!
customer_reviews.author: K. McKay

customer_reviews.title: Weird taste
customer_reviews.text: These are somewhat crappy. They are flavorless, cannot tell one flavor from another. Like chewing gum after it has lost all its flavor. Would never purchase again. They also have an oddly chemical taste and smell. Will be tossing these. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Carl Wright

customer_reviews.title: Gummi Bears not good with the temp is above 100 and they are in a truck all day
customer_reviews.text: These probably would have tasted good like they smelled when I received them. It was above 100 degrees the day they were delivered. They were cooking in the bag all day in the delivery truck. The package inside was so hot and when i opened them the smell made me want to try one but I had to put them in the freeze to cool them down. The flavor is weak I am sure because of them being so hot. Not something I will order again until it cools down in Arizona.
customer_reviews.author: Tina P

customer_reviews.title: The BEST gummy bears out there.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! 5lbs for $13.00! I keep them in a tupperware container in my desk at work for little snack thru out the day. I imagine they would melt together if you ordered during hot and humid weather like some other reviewers had commented. I received mine in perfect condition each and every time I ordered. They are the BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Best gummies EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These were not named worlds best for no reason. They are by far the best gummies that I have ever tried. They are full of flavor and really easy to chew. It’s like they melt in your mouth. The only problem I have with them is they are super addicting. People that usually do not like gummies love these. I will be buying again 😍
customer_reviews.author: Kreview

customer_reviews.title: They're "fine" - I prefer Haribo.
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely softer and less chewy than Haribo, so stick with these if you want something easier on your teeth. I personally found them too artificial (chemical) tasting and smelling, but the taste wasn't so overpowering that I hated them. They're not bad, but if I'm getting 5 pounds of the stuff, I'd rather have something better than "not bad".
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Albanese Gummi Bears 12 Flavors
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, they are softer than the Haribo or Black Forest brands. It's also fun to have some different flavors besides the "usual" basic fare. They have a somewhat perfume-like smell and taste, but it's nothing objectionable. The Black Forest Gummys have a more natural fruit flavor than the Albanese, but I'll still buy these in the future, simply for the unusual flavors they come in.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mosso

customer_reviews.title: Best gummies EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I heard aboutthse gummies from my hairdresser who was talking to someone else about the gummies from Marshal's dept store. So, I bought a small pack from there and was hooked! These are packed full of flavor, and super soft, like they were made today. These large bags arent lasting as lo g as I thought they would because I eat to many be cause they taste so freaking good. Its 90 calories for 8 I think. I usually get them I about two days. The bag says made in USA. Yummy!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: A guilty pleasure
customer_reviews.text: These are the freshest, most flavorful gummie bears easily available. I confess that gummi candies are a secret indulgence of mine, even though I know they are terrible for my teeth and body. All that sugar isn’t healthy. But sometimes you just need a handful of fruity bears to get through the day. Buying 5 lbs at a time probably isn’t the smartest move, but they stay do fresh and all the individual flavors are distinct and taste like they should.
customer_reviews.author: Nightfall

customer_reviews.title: The freshest and tastiest on the planet
customer_reviews.text: I must say, these are by far the BEST gummies out there, both in taste/freshness and in value. Five pounds is a LOT of gummies! I was worried about being able to get them eaten before they harden. Well that’s not an issue, as it turns out. They’re soft and moist, varied and fruity, with hints of tropical fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Love this but dont order it i the summer
customer_reviews.text: This will melt into a giant block. I had two bag i made a mistake of ordering in the summer. One bag melted and the second bag got me sick. I don't really blame amazon since you can't control the summer heat or some of the carriers who dont care about handling the package well. I knew better but i really wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshoe

customer_reviews.title: The BEST gummy bears
customer_reviews.text: These things created a serious addiction that I was unprepared for. I ordered 10 lbs. Yes, you read that right, TEN POUNDS. My nephews eat these, so my step daughter raved about them when she came home from her Nana’s. I ordered them and realized that there is no turning back. You’ll never want to eat another brand of gummy bears ever again. I almost want to say they are DANGEROUS. Order them now and thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Waters

customer_reviews.title: Found a bug. Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Found a bug inside. These tasted fresh and chewy and all was fine until I found a flat dead bug on one of them. Gross. Amazon is sending a new bag and I'm hoping this is an anomaly. Look before you eat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gummy Bears - On Par With Haribo
customer_reviews.text: Great gummy bears...everybody at work loves them. We’ve been crushing Haribo gummy bears lately and somebody said these were better, so I had no choice but to order a five pound bag to see first hand. I’m not sure if they are actually better or not...they’re both delicious. These are softer than Haribo though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C.

customer_reviews.title: Best gummy bears
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gummy bears Ive had. We stumbled upon a small bag at a check out at a craft store of all places, and tried them just for the heck of it. They are so soft and fresh! I had to see if I can get them online, and these delivered super fast and super fresh! Def recommend the value over trying to find the little marked up bags at a store!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TIP: let them air out to firm up
customer_reviews.text: GIANT BAG. I had to transfer them to large Tupperware containers because the bag ripped open down the side—5lbs is a lot of gummy bears if you drop them on the floor. 😬 TIP: they’re even better if you let them dry out a juuuuuust a little. The texture when they’re fresh is kind of moist/soft. I like them a little more firm. :) Soooooo tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle P

customer_reviews.title: Be Very Careful When Buying These...
customer_reviews.text: The inherent problem with these gummies isn't that they're better than other gummy bears - it's that they're better than most other food. I have single-handedly consumed an entire five pound bag of these myself over a period of two weeks. During that time, I had to sort of push myself to eat "regular" food and not just eat gummy bears. I don't have this problem with chips, cookies, ice cream, cake, or literally any other food I've ever tried. I desperately wish I could get another bag, but I clearly haven't the self-restraint to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Hoq

customer_reviews.title: I am now a Gummy Bear Person!
customer_reviews.text: I was never into Gummy Bears or the like, even growing up as a kid. Something about the texture i did not enjoy. However, while on a recent business trip, I was introduced to these my my colleague who insisted I try them. Hands down one of the best "candies" I've ever had. Soft, juicy and packed with flavor. I immediately purchased a bag at the airport for my return flight, and have now found them MUCH cheaper here on Amazon. I bring a 5-lb bag on all my trips, and keep a small bag stashed in my night stand. If you like dummies, give this brand a try if you haven't yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dom G

customer_reviews.title: Price hike! $12.99 to $16.88. WHAT???
customer_reviews.text: I was a 5 star review, however, I was going to reorder after one week and I noticed the price jumped up to $16.88. I bought just a week ago at $12.99. They’re still good but why the price being jacked up for the holidays??? I discovered this product last year and love the soft chewy texture and varied flavors that make this product different from other gummies. I’m hooked and had to buy a good deal - 5 lb bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: MoshiMoshii

customer_reviews.title: Gummies 4 life they say.
customer_reviews.text: So long Haribo gummies, this is the new KING of gummies. These flavors are so more satisfying. Kept me going til I ate the whole bag in two days. Just sitting there, watching TV or gaming or messing with my girl and eating these. She even got addicted to them even after giving me that disappointing look and thought bubble saying (Why didn't you buy Haribo gummies?). So for those who want to try something new, I suggest these as a substitute. You may be surprised how good they are and they are more softer than the Haribo ones too from my experience.
customer_reviews.author: King Kaus

customer_reviews.title: These are the best gummy’s ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gummy’s ever. I first discovered them in a a store that Overstock things but the next time I went to get them they weren’t available. So I looked them up on Amazon and they were basically the same price. Excellent flavor gummy’s and texture. And you only need a few to quench your sweet tooth.
customer_reviews.author: DaveInBoston

customer_reviews.title: Best Gummy Bears Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Gummy Bear Lover and was spending an arm and a leg to buy these gummy bears in a bin candy store in the mall and had no idea they were these gummy bears and I could get them this reasonably priced! The flavors of these gummy bears are superb and they are perfectly fresh and delicious! You can’t go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: DallasMamaof2

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are a second runner up to Happy Yummies. I would definitely purchase again and I would recommend these as a gift for the gummy lover. They are much softer than Haribo, but if I had to pick my favorite gummy ever, these wouldn't be #1.. but a close second. Still, a yummy gummy and MADE IN USA! :D
customer_reviews.author: AVAMARIE

customer_reviews.title: Burst of Flavor Without Excessive Sugar
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived fast and product was very fresh. You could smell the freshness while opening the package. Pleasantly surprised by the flavor of these gummies. These literally melt in your mouth ! A great burst of actual flavor and not a mouthful of sugar as with other gummies. Will be buying these soon again, highly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: These are so good that I have to give them 3 stars.
customer_reviews.text: These are so good and I have to give them 3 stars to warn people from them. you can't stop eating them until you are 300 Lbs. They are so good, but do yourselves a favor and buy smaller package so you don't eat so much of them all at one time. I hope you read between the lines. 😁
customer_reviews.author: B.B.O

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Huge quantity lol
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the 8oz and it goes so fast.....5lbs...sure! I don't know what I expected but this exceeded it lol Amazing flavor as always...mine didn't arrive melted down into one block - but it is autumn so not sure if this is something I'd reorder in the summer. Very happy :3
customer_reviews.author: SOpe707

customer_reviews.title: First time
customer_reviews.text: WOW....We have been eating gummy bears for YEARS and this is the first time that we have tried Albanese. OH MY LORD, these are the best ones we have ever eaten. Such strong and wonderful taste and so soft and chewy. Never again, will we eat any other brand, again. WOOOOOT.... Winner
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly addictive, you can’t eat just a few!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gummies in the world! I love Albanese gummies, the company has been around for many years. You get a lot for your buck! The only drawback is the larger bag doesn’t have a ziplock closure. Be sure to store these in an airtight ziplock or container to keep freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I hate the taste, but the texture was great.
customer_reviews.text: These got such great reviews I tried them. I made the mistake of not reading the bad reviews. My husband and I think they smell like chemicals and I don't feel safe to eat them. One smells like funky underarm! Apparently we are NOT alone! Hope I can return. Certainly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I love gummies and I personally like these the most out of the ones I have tried. My picky toddler even loves them and we share them as an occasional snack. I buy the big bag cause it's a bit cheaper and lasts longer. The gummies do not dry out either as long as you close the bag up well after you get some.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are way easier to chew than the haribo gummy bears. The flavors are amazing yet not overwhelming. 5 pounds is a lot of gummy bears but trust me, it’ll be gone in a month when you have house mates with sweet tooths. I recommend buying a big mason jar to store them, but any air tight container will do. I just separated them into four big ziplock bags and they were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a smaller bag of these and was thrilled when I checked amazon and they came in bigger sizes. Received the package and everything was fine until I bit into one and discovered a HORRIBLE taste. Upon further inspection it appears to be mold inside the gummy bear. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Smithmbt

customer_reviews.title: These truly are the world's best gummi bears!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these on a whim because my husband requested a "giant bag of gummi bears" when I asked him if he wanted to add anything to an Amazon order I had in progress. We ended up liking them so much that we bought several additional bags to give to friends and family. Every bag we've had has been the same... soft, flavorful, and soooo good. Albanese isn't kidding around when they say these are the world's best gummi bears. If there's better out there, we haven't found them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brand of gummy bear
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these a few times at gas stations and always enjoyed them, but they can be hard to find in my area. My only complaint with the 5lb bag is that it doesn't have a reseal zipper. I love this brand - their quality is excellent. They don't have that hard/tough texture that a lot of gummy candies get - they're soft and juicy. Each flavor is bold and comes through nicely - even flavors like grapefruit that I normally don't care for taste great here. I can also highly recommend the "Ultimate" flavors which have some unique ones like Blackcurrant. I haven't tried the Sour flavor set, but I would assume them to be of similar quality.
customer_reviews.author: MasPan

customer_reviews.title: So delicious, getting requests to keep buying
customer_reviews.text: These are so delicious!! Even my 92yr old super picky grandfather asked if we could buy more. There is no flavor not to like and it's a super reasonable price. I've bought special flavor gummy bears from another company that had about 7 flavors and cost about 50% more. We will keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: StormyMorning

customer_reviews.title: Not Sugar-Free but tastes like it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big gummy candy fan and with all the people raving about these in the reviews I thought I'd give them a go. The shipping was fine and the candy arrived in perfect shape but I'm just not a fan of the taste of them. I suppose the flavors stand out enough to recognize them but the candy overall has that kind of sickly sweet chemical taste that reminds me of artificial sweeteners. I thought it definitely needed more sour to even it out. A lot of people seem to like the flavor, but if you're not a fan of the taste of splenda you might try a smaller bag of these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best On The Market!!
customer_reviews.text: These are too good!! Very addictive. Bet you can’t eat just 1!! Lol Flavor pops! Softer than most other gummies I’ve tried. In my opinion these are the best on the market! Arrived on time and in perfect condition. Very fresh,and packed well. I purchased a 5 lbs bag and feel the price was very reasonable. Also bought a 5lbs bag of the wild cherry flavor. Also addictive!! Plenty to share!! Love the flavors!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Lewis

customer_reviews.title: These gummy bears will heal your aching soul
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface this by saying that I love gummy bears. There is no candy superior to the fruity chewy goodness of the most colorful of bears. One day when I was having a particularly rough week, I went to the grocery store across town to get my favorite gummy bears, only to discover that they were out. Distraught, I turned to the internet to heal the gaping, gummy bear-shaped wound in my soul. And sure enough, Amazon delivered. Specifically, two days later (thank you prime!) they delivered five glorious pounds of the best gummy bears in existence. These gummy bears brought me joy at a time when no other food could. I give these gummy bears five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Both Bags Arrived Open!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bag via no-rush shipping in time for Easter and my first bag arrived split open in the middle with bears everywhere. A replacement bag was sent and arrived with about a 6 inch opening at the top. I don't think I would take my chances with eating them under normal circumstances, but during the pandemic.... 10 pounds of bears went straight into the trash :( I gave two stars because the replacement was sent quickly, which I did appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Irish twin momma

customer_reviews.title: You probably need this.
customer_reviews.text: I firmly believe that everyone needs a solid five pound bag of gummy bears. Going through a break up? Gummy bears. Just got a promotion? Gummy bears. Stuck in a worldwide pandemic-induced quarantine? GUMMY BEARS. And not just any gummy bears. THESE gummy bears. Top notch. Lots of flavors. Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: The worlds best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gummy bears in my opinion. I have a had time finding these locally because they're always sold out. I started buying the 5-pound bags. I eat these as a post-workout snack to keep me going. Great product and will keep ordering them as long as they make them.
customer_reviews.author: GRB Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not Your Mama's Gummy Bears!
customer_reviews.text: The best gummy bears ever! I picked up a small pack at a drug store one day (just curious about the brand). When I bit into one, I couldn't believe how different they tasted from other brands. These are softer, juicier, have more intense flavor, and more flavor options than typical gummy bears. I was both surprised and excited to see this giant bag on Amazon. I HAD to buy them!
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerReporter

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting gummies EVER
customer_reviews.text: I like gummies but don’t have a huge sweet tooth, but these gummy bears are on a totally different level. They are so flavorful, tasty and have the perfect texture. I would buy them whenever I came across them then discovered this HUGE bag, so now I have a subscription
customer_reviews.author: Christina Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, best fruit gummies I've ever tasted so far. The five pound bag can be a little unwieldy, but unless you store them somewhere hot, the bears retain their shape pretty well even after a couple weeks. Would highly recommend for those looking for that fruity fix.
customer_reviews.author: S Morgan Hunt

customer_reviews.title: So thrilled to have found these
customer_reviews.text: These are like the 'goomie' bears I was introduced to many years ago in San Francisco at Ghiradelli Square by a German friend. Not too sweet, soft gummy enough to chew, with the most wonderful flavors. The aroma wafting from the bag is heavenly. Hate when I try others that are so hard w/no flavor. My niece who doesn't eat sweets often even loved them!! So happy I found out about this Albanese brand...
customer_reviews.author: NextChapter

customer_reviews.title: If you're going to eat 5lbs of gummy bears, buy the good ones
customer_reviews.text: These were delicious. Better quality and better value than the little bags I would pick up on a whim at the grocery store. But the down side to buying 5lbs of gummy bears is... that you're going to eat 5lbs of gummy bears. You'll just have to live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Heironimus

customer_reviews.title: tasty treat for the gluten intolerant
customer_reviews.text: i saw the reviews that said that these taste funny, but that's because they don't taste like the super sugar traditional gummy bears people might be used to. I think they are great and at this price they are cheaper than buying 2 of the 2.5 lb bags at wally world. enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: The Haribo Bear is Dead to Me
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo Good. Finding Albanese gummies changed my life. I have always eaten a lot of fruity candies and gummies in particular, but I stumbled upon the "12 Flavor" Albanese a while back and decided to give them a try. Probably 30# worth of gummies later I still love them. I leave them in my desk and have introduced coworkers and friends to them and every time the person can't believe how good they are. I especially love this packaging, too. It's great that they make a giant sized bag that looks like the small ones as opposed to just selling them in the clear plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: 😋 delicious
customer_reviews.text: haha weird that I'm reviewing gummy bears but these guys are awesome. Taste great and soft. Wish they were a little harder and chewy but you can remedy this by leaving it open to air for a day to kinda dry them out. But overall super delicious
customer_reviews.author: Phong Trinh

customer_reviews.title: ADDICTING
customer_reviews.text: These are, by FAR, the BEST gummi bears EVER. they are so flavorful, so soft, and consistently delicious. I have to portion these out so I don't eat the entire bag in one sitting. The bad reviews on here are clearly confused.***DISCLAIMER *** BUT THESE NOW!!! you WILL NOT be disappointed. I have tried so many other brands, this brand has consistently remained the same. The only downside is, it took me waaaay too long to find this brand. Now I'm never turning back. I'm an Albanese snob, and proud.
customer_reviews.author: 14Cassie L

customer_reviews.title: Happiest big kid :)
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his gummy bears. I buy small bags of this brand every week while grocery shopping, so to be able to find these for him was a perfect present for Christmas. He opened them and his reaction was priceless. Definitely a big kid in the candy store. I bought my husband another bag as a just because present. These are his favorite :) I ordered another bag for my husband. I had an amazon gift card and spent it on him.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie myhand

customer_reviews.title: 100% THE Best!
customer_reviews.text: The ads aren't kidding with these little guys! The flavors are all great. The texture is soft but not too soft. Almost all the bears come out with their signature faces and paws. You haven't lived until you have tried these, and you will never be the same or go back to crappy gummi bears ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Gummy bear connoisseur, Albanese is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Best flavor, and tasting gummy bears out there! My nephews & nieces love these gummy bears, and so do I! They are in my office for clients, employees, and myself! And to get a big bag 5lb bag is amazing 😀 I buy these every month and highly recommend! Plus they are healthier than other brands, fresh flavor, and do not go stale or harden up after a week. Purely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Dammit! already, My order is supposed to arrive today.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Gummies. I truly hope they are as tasty as everybody in the 5-Star club say's they are 😋. Is Albanese really the best? Edit: I have to click the "overall flavor", etc. to post this review.
customer_reviews.author: John Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Family favorite
customer_reviews.text: My little brother started purchasing these 2 years ago and since then they have become a family favorite. (They were his favorite first) His birthday is coming up, so of course, I'm buying these. They always deliver on freshness and taste!
customer_reviews.author: D Stamp of Approval 👊

product_meta.title: Albanese World's Best 12 Flavor Gummi Bears, 5 Pound Bag
product_meta.description:
World’s Best – it’s not just on our bag, it’s at the heart of everything we do. From sourcing the best available ingredients, to making our gummies right here in the USA, we focus on doing things right - from start to finish. And we know that you'll taste the difference. From the first bite, you’ll notice a soft chew that makes our gummies a real treat to eat. Then you’ll be amazed by our fresh fruit flavors, flavors so good you’ll be calling your favorites by their names - Cherry, Pink Grapefruit, Watermelon, Strawberry, Orange, Blue Raspberry, Lime, Grape, Green Apple, Mango, Pineapple, and Lemon. So, while you can spell it gummi bears or gummy bears, remember there is only one way to spell World’s Best – Albanese! Don’t just take our word for it, grab a bag and taste the best for yourself. 

The Albanese family has been making gummi bears, gummi worms, specialty gummi shapes, individual flavor gummies, and of course our gourmet chocolates right here in the United States for over 30 years. During that time we've focused on creating the perfect gummies and one of a kind chocolates. Once our fans got a taste, they couldn’t get enough. Soon fans were stocking up on their favorite 12 Flavor Gummi Bears and Gummi Worms! Lucky for you, it’s easier than ever to treat yourself to the World’s Best Albanese Candies. Forget the drive and order online today.
feature_bullets: FRESH & FRUITY: Albanese 12-flavor gummy bears pack giant taste into one delicious gummi. After one bite of these fruity gummies, you'll taste the difference of giant fresh fruit flavors & a deliciously soft chew you won't find with other gummy candies.

STOCK UP THE FLAVOR: Whether you like them sweet, sour, big or small, Albanese gummi candies burst with fresh fruit flavors & you can stock up with a bulk pack of your favorite flavor. Delight your tastebuds with Albanese gummy worms, gummy bears & more!

PERFECT SNACK: Fat free, gluten free, and dairy free, Albanese assorted gummy candies are your new perfect sweet and soft snack. There's a reason Albanese gummies are the world's best & once you try our deliciously fruity assortment, we know you'll agree.

ALLERGY FRIENDLY: Peanut free, tree nut free, dairy free, MSG free, gluten free, and with no artificial sweeteners, Albanese gummy candies are an allergy friendly snack packed with a sweet, fruity flavor everyone can enjoy. Sweet gummies, giant flavor. Low sodium

RECIPE FOR SUCCESS: For over 30 years Albanese has been making delicious treats with high-quality ingredients here in the United States. Taste the difference in our gummies, chocolates, nuts, & mixes!
